official_name: Ishan Uday Special Scholarship Scheme for North Eastern Region
introduction: The Ministry of Education and UGC launched the 'Ishan Uday' Special Scholarship Scheme to promote higher education in the North Eastern Region (NER) and encourage children from economically weaker sections to pursue professional education.

eligibility_criteria.domicile: Student must be a domicile of North Eastern states (Assam, Arunachal Pradesh, Manipur, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland, Sikkim, Tripura)
academic_requirements: Passed Class 12 or equivalent in the preceding year
Secured admission in the first year of any general, technical, or professional degree course
eligibility_criteria.exclusions: Students pursuing courses through Open Universities or Distance Mode are NOT eligible.

scholarship_benefits.distribution: Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) via Canara Bank
